mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction_basic (uuid, plnm_no, pbct_no, pbct_cdtn_no, bid_mnmt_no, cltr_mnmt_no, scrn_grp_cd, ctgr_full_nm, pbct_cltr_stat_nm, dpsl_mtd_cd, dpsl_mtd_nm, bid_mtd_nm, pbct_begn_dtm, pbct_cls_dtm, uscbd_cnt, iqry_cnt) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{plnmNo}, #{pbctNo}, #{pbctCdtnNo}, #{bidMnmtNo}, #{cltrMnmtNo}, #{scrnGrpCd}, #{ctgrFullNm}, #{pbctCltrStatNm}, #{dpslMtdCd}, #{dpslMtdNm}, #{bidMtdNm}, #{pbctBegnDtm}, #{pbctClsDtm}, #{uscbdCnt}, #{iqryCnt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pbct_no = VALUES(pbct_no), pbct_cdtn_no = VALUES(pbct_cdtn_no), bid_mnmt_no = VALUES(bid_mnmt_no), cltr_mnmt_no = VALUES(cltr_mnmt_no), scrn_grp_cd = VALUES(scrn_grp_cd), ctgr_full_nm = VALUES(ctgr_full_nm), pbct_cltr_stat_nm = VALUES(pbct_cltr_stat_nm), dpsl_mtd_cd = VALUES(dpsl_mtd_cd), dpsl_mtd_nm = VALUES(dpsl_mtd_nm), bid_mtd_nm = VALUES(bid_mtd_nm), pbct_begn_dtm = VALUES(pbct_begn_dtm), pbct_cls_dtm = VALUES(pbct_cls_dtm), uscbd_cnt = VALUES(uscbd_cnt), iqry_cnt = VALUES(iqry_cnt);
